Package com.github.bogieclj.molecule.system

The core package of the Molecule system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionHandler
    ExceptionHandler interface is used within the Molecule framework as an instance to handle all unhandled exceptions in the molecule system.
    Fn
    The Fn interface represents a Function in the Molecule Framework.
    LifecycleManager
    The LifecycleManager represents concept of a component which is responsible for handling lifecycle of a set of services within the Molecule Framework.
    OnExit
    On Exit represents the extension point exposed by the services in Molecule system to get a call back when the system is exiting.
    OnStartup
    On Startup represents the extension point exposed by the services in Molecule System to get a call back when the system is starting up.
    Operation
    An Operation represents the operation within the domain.
    Param
    The input and output of Fn are abstracted as Param represented by the interface Param Param can be logically visualized as a persistent Map similar to the concept in the language Clojure.
    ParamDeclaration
    The ParamDeclaration represents the Declaration of a Param.
    Shell
    Represents the logical shell within in the Molecule framework.
    Sys
    Abstraction of a System in Molecule.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultParamDeclaration
    The Default implementation of ParamDeclaration
    InOutParam
    The default implementation of Param This class is widely used within Molecule as the default instance for Params.
    SimpleOperation
    Default implementation of Operation
    URIFn
    The URIFn is a wrapper Fn implementation which provides the ability to wrap a Function to provide the ability to specify URI for the Fn as well as support in and out param declarations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidOperationException
    Represents an Invalid Operation in the Molecule Framework
    LifecycleException
    Represents the errors faced during the startup and shutdown of services within the Molecule framework

Package com.github.bogieclj.molecule.system Description

The core package of the Molecule system. This package holds the key interfaces , annotations and classes which form the base of the Molecule Framework.
Author:
Vijayakumar Mohan
